name: The Last Alien Hunter
description:
Become the world last and greatest alien hunter. Survival style sci-fi game with lots of mobs, guns, explosives, power ups, rewards, secrets and final bosses.

Can you own the Leaderboard?

- v.1.0.2 - fixed spawn points for level difference, added NavMesh
- v.1.0.1 - raised the drop rate
- v.1.0.0 - ran out of time to finish up the sci-fi UI
